DarkMouse::

She heard the scream and  looked at the two fighting. "Hang on you 
guys."  She ran down to the haal and went tot he lab. She saw 
Drillbit on the floor, holding and rocking KitKat's body.  She was 
shocked and stood at the door, her face turning pale.  She looked 
down at Drillbit "What happened?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He saw what was happaning. He opened the chamber and held her body.
> "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1"
> The sound of his scream could be heard 1/2 a mile away.
> He held her close. He began to cry.
> "I... I... I love you!"
> Hundreds of thoughts ran through his head. They would never be 
married.
> They would never settle down back on Cybertron, and have a family. 
He
> thought of who to call. He opened his link.
> "S.. St.. Star Scream! Wherever you are get back to base NOW!!!"
> He began rocking bace and forward, holding her. He would have 
revenge!
